title: Lobby Disconnect
body: After champion selection and load-out phase, before the server load in. The game says Reconnect then game in progess shortly after and won't open the load screen client. Any ideas that could help? This started happening after the most recent game update. {{summoner:11}}

replies.body: Do me a favor and try [**configuring your firewalls**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) to allow League's traffic through. It's not uncommon for firewalls to get in the way of our client's connections, but do let me know if this doesn't help.
